channel.title: [317][DELTA] Runescape V1 {Alright Delta, i guess.}
channel.description:
RUNESCAPE V1 By:CarlosATheTruth [I used RandQm's source, client, cache edited alot.]
COMPILER:(OVERALL:10000000000%) BOTH COMPILER AND RUN BEAST COMPILER. 100% MADE BY: CarlosATheTruth. COMPILER AND RUN.CMD IS SICK!!
Combat: PvP fully complete PvN fully complete PVM fully complete Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Equipment requirements
Magic: Every modern combat spell Can't mage through walls Alching NO OTHER SPELLBOOKS! All Runescape teleports(Varrock, Falador,etc.)
Range: Bows/arrows Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances Perfect formulas.
Prayer: All bones bury-able Every prayer spells working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate NO OTHER SPELLBOOKS.
Mining: Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems(85%)
Smithing All bars can be made(67%) All bars can be forged into items(70%) All equipment can be produced(40%) Correct animations, interfaces and objects used(85%) Great formula!
Fishing All fish can be caught (65%) Big net fishing Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world (30%) Correct animations (67%)
Cooking: Picking wheat Filling flour bin Bread Meat Pizza Cakes Potatoes Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used (89%) All cook items cookable (65%)
Woodcutting: Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able
Firemaking All logs light able Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped
Crafting: (OVERALL:60%) Leather crafting Full tanning Pottery (fired and unfired items) Gem cutting Jewellry making Spinning wheel
Runecrafting All altars working Correct multiple crafting Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting
Fletching:(OVERALL:80%) All logs can be fletched Correct interfaces Fletch 5, 10, x, all Bow stringing Arrow&Bolt making
Thieving:(OVERALL:40%) Stall Thieving NPC Thieving Correct anims & gfx Correct Respawn Times
Slayer:(OVERALL: 10%)(LOL, got to add alot) Working slayer gem Working slayer shop All slayer masters
Quest SKILL: 12 Quests (30%) Custom Quests 2 REAL QUESTS TUTORIAL ISLAND (70%, some npc problems...)
Herblore:(OVERALL: 85%) All potions makeable Itentifying herbs Weapon poisioning
Music:(NONE)
MEDIA: [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/kapvt2.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/o91he1.png[/img]
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/23vah6v.png[/img]
[img]http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/4220/68922312.png[/img]
(Didn't have time to add anymore.)
I added and fixed quests only 4 on atm. The other 8 are coded in but not added.
Thanks- RandQm, and DeltaScape.
CREDITS: Delta: 50% RandQm: 25% RandQm's Assistants: 10% Me: 15%
DOWNLOADS: PACKAGED:[url=http://uppit.com/g3qlg0fcjdxs/Runescape_V1.zip]http://uppit.com/g3qlg0fcjdxs/Runescape_V1.zip [/url] IF BROKEN:[url=http://up.ht/X938cP]http://up.ht/X938cP [/url]
DO NOT FLAME THAT DELTA SUCKS, ATLEAST SAY NICE OR LEAVE IF YOU DON'T LIKE DELTA. YOU SHULND'T BE HERE ON THIS TOPIC IF YOU HATE DELTA, SO PLEASE LOVVVVEEEE OFF. :| ;D

item.title: [317][DELTA] Runescape V1 {Alright Delta, i guess.}
item.dc:creator: @CaZz_TaZz CaZz TaZz
item.description:
@CaZz_TaZz wrote:

Okay I Deleted The Compiler+Run, And Created The Seprate When I Run The Run.bat It Say

Usage: java [-options] class [args…]
(to execute a class)
or java [-options] -jar jarfile [args…]
(to execute a jar file)
where options include:
-d32 use a 32-bit data model if available
-d64 use a 64-bit data model if available
-client to select the “client” VM
-server to select the “server” VM
-hotspot is a synonym for the “client” VM [deprecated]
The default VM is client.

-cp <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
-classpath <class search path of directories and zip/jar files>
              A ; separated list of directories, JAR archives,
              and ZIP archives to search for class files.
-D<name>=<value>
              set a system property
-verbose:[class|gc|jni]
              enable verbose output
-version      print product version and exit
-version:<value>
              require the specified version to run
-showversion  print product version and continue
-jre-restrict-search | -no-jre-restrict-search
              include/exclude user private JREs in the version search
-? -help      print this help message
-X            print help on non-standard options
-ea[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-enableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              enable assertions with specified granularity
-da[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
-disableassertions[:<packagename>...|:<classname>]
              disable assertions with specified granularity
-esa | -enablesystemassertions
              enable system assertions
-dsa | -disablesystemassertions
              disable system assertions
-agentlib:<libname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library <libname>, e.g. -agentlib:hprof
              see also, -agentlib:jdwp=help and -agentlib:hprof=help
-agentpath:<pathname>[=<options>]
              load native agent library by full pathname
-javaagent:<jarpath>[=<options>]
              load Java programming language agent, see java.lang.instrument

-splash:<imagepath>
              show splash screen with specified image

See http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/documentation/index.html for m
ore details.
Press any key to continue . . .

And My Run.bat Is

@echo off
color 0a
title Runescape v1
java -Xmx512m
pause

Read full topic
